languages.text:
In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat, the wearer gains the following benefits:
-<indent=5%>+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The wearer's movement cost is not affected by threatened areas.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The wearer's movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
The wearer gains +50 MP in the first round of combat. Their movement cost is not reduced by threatening areas.
Also, the wearer's movement does not trigger attacks of opportunity during this round.

The wearer gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} in the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat. Their movement cost is not reduced by threatened areas.
Also, the wearer's movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this round.

The wearer gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} in the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat. Their movement cost is not reduced by threatening areas.
Also, the wearer's movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this round.

The wearer gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} in the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat. Their movement cost is not reduced by threatened areas.
Also, the wearer's movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this round.

languages.text:
装备者在战斗首{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}时，获得以下加成效果：
- <indent=5%>额外获得20点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>装备者的移动不会受到敌人威胁区域影响。</indent>
- <indent=5%>装备者的移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。</indent>

languages.text:
На время первого {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} боя персонаж получает следующие бонусы:
-<indent=5%>+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>В областях угрозы затраты ОП на движение не возрастают.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Движение персонажа не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.</indent>
languages.original_text:
In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat, the wearer gains the following benefits:

-<indent=5%>The wearer's movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Персонаж получает +50 ОП в первом раунде боя. В областях угрозы затраты ОП на движение не возрастают.
Также движение персонажа в этом раунде не провоцирует атаки по возможности.

Персонаж получает +50 ОП в первом раунде боя. В областях угрозы затраты ОП на движение не возрастают.
Также движение персонажа в этом раунде не провоцирует атаки по возможности.

languages.text:
戦闘の最初の{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で、使用者は次の効果を獲得する：
-<indent=5%>+20{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}。</indent>
-<indent=5%>使用者の移動コストは、脅威エリアの影響を受けない。</indent>
-<indent=5%>使用者の移動は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を発動しない。</indent>
languages.original_text:

-<indent=5%>The wearer's movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.</indent>

・<indent=5%>+20{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}。</indent>

・<indent=5%>使用者の移動は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を発動しない。</indent>

languages.text:
Durante el primer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} del combate, el portador recibe los siguientes beneficios:
-<indent=5%>+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>El coste de movimiento del portador no se ve afectado por zonas amenazadas.</indent>
-<indent=5%>El movimiento del portador no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.</indent>
languages.original_text:
In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat, the wearer gains the following benefits:

-<indent=5%>The wearer's movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Durante el primer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} del combate, el portador recibe los siguientes beneficios:
-<indent=5%>+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>El coste de movimiento del portador no se ve afectado por zonas amenazadas.</indent>
-<indent=5%>El movimiento del portador no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
In der ersten {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} des Kampfes erhält der Träger folgende Vorteile:
-<indent=5%>+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Die Bewegungskosten werden durch bedrohte Bereiche nicht beeinflusst.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Bewegungen des Trägers lösen keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} aus.</indent>
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
Lors du premier {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} de combat, l'utilisateur reçoit les avantages suivants :
-<indent=5%>+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Le coût de ses déplacements n'est pas affecté par les zones menacées.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Ses déplacements ne déclenchent pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.</indent>
languages.original_text:
In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat, the wearer gains the following benefits:
-<indent=5%>+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The wearer's movement cost is not affected by threatened areas.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The wearer's movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
L'utilisateur bénéficie de +50 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} au premier {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} de combat. Les zones menaçantes ne réduisent pas le coût de ses déplacements.
De plus, les déplacements de l'utilisateur ne déclenchent pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g} pendant ce round.

Lors du premier {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} de combat, l'utilisateur reçoit les avantages suivants :
-<indent=5%>+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Le coût de ses déplacements n'est pas affecté par les zones menacées.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Ses déplacements ne déclenchent pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.</indent>

Le personnage gagne +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} au premier {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} de combat et les zones menacées ne réduisent pas le coût de ses déplacements.
De plus, ses déplacements ne déclenchent pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} pendant ce round.

languages.text: In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat the wearer gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, their movement cost is not affected by threatened areas and their movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat the wearer gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, their movement cost is not affected by threatened areas and their movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

languages.text:
Giyen kişi, çatışmanın ilk {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raundunda{/g} şu yararları kazanır:
-<indent=5%>+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Giyen kişinin hareket etme bedeli, tehdit alanlarında azalmaz.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Giyen kişinin hareketleri, {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez.</indent>
